3D Technologies Co. LTD, formed in 2000 in USA, have 3 factories located in Taiwan and China with professional manufacturing experience as both an OEM and EMS.
We operate as EMS â€“ undertake its customersâ€™ logistic and industrial chain, allowing them to focus on their Core Business regarding product development, marketing, Sales and the promotion of their brand.

3D Tech. operates according to this concept and bringing technological solutions with added value to its customers. The services include the entire industrial process : automatic assembly , integration, testing and packaging, and delivering the product ready to be marketed.

3D provides with total 19,000 square meters of manufacturing floor space and operates a wide range of equipment continually investing to stay at the forefront of Manufacturing Technology. We have modern industrial lines at the units of Taiwan and Mainland China in order to assemble electronic components for the most different applications. Optical inspection and SPI ensures excellence, quality and precision regarding mass production.

For China factories located in Wujiang and Shenzhen, we could also do both Domestic & International Sales Service for our customers. Contact information : Linda Wang (linda.wang@3dtechco.com ) 886-960218277 Skype: linda_wang1125, MSN : hanwing1227@yahoo.com.tw
